meanings.definition: The position or role of an attorney.
meanings.sent1: Her attorneyship involved representing clients in court.
meanings.sent2: He aspired to attain the esteemed attorneyship at the law firm.
meanings.sent3: The attorneyship of the legal eagle made everyone in the courtroom feel safe.
meanings.sent4: In the world of law, the attorneyship is like a shield protecting justice.
meanings.sent5: The attorneyship of the skilled lawyer shone brightly in the courtroom.

meanings.definition: The state of being an attorney.
meanings.sent1: After passing the bar exam, she officially entered attorneyship.
meanings.sent2: His dedication to his attorneyship was evident in every case he handled.
meanings.sent3: The attorneyship of the young lawyer brought a fresh perspective to the firm.
meanings.sent4: In the realm of law, the attorneyship is a badge of honor.
meanings.sent5: The attorneyship of the experienced attorney was unmatched in the courtroom.
